io.amelia.looper

Class AbstractLooper.LooperControl

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:

    public class AbstractLooper.LooperControl
extends java.lang.Object
    LooperControl exposes sensitive and/or volatile methods and fields outside the package.

      • runAsync

        public void runAsync(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Executes Runnable on a new thread, i.e., async.

        We also add the new thread to the aliases, such that calls to the LooperFactory.obtain() returns this AbstractLooper.

        This also prevents a async task from creating a new Looper by accident.

      • signalInfallibleStartup

        public void signalInfallibleStartup()
